>From: "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@...>

Uh, DarkMouse is on the Predacon reprogramming table getting reprogrammed.

---------Original Message--------------------

>*Wrath Kamodia running along spot Darkmouse* Wrath: Is she a Maximal?
>Kamodia: Were gonna have to find out! *Wrath and Kamodia go running over 
>the
>hill and Wrath starts shooting his shoulder cannons at Manterror and Double
>Punch while Kamodia starts shooting eye lasers at Injector*
>----- Original Message -----
>From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>
>To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
>Sent: Sunday, June 18, 2000 2:34 PM
>Subject: Re: New Beast Wars
>
>
> > Ursa Major/DarkMouse
> >
> >
> > Ursa Major: Lunges forward pushing Archangle out of the way of the
>missles.
> >
> > DarkMouse:  The optic blasts hit in the leg and she lets out a bone
>chilling
> > scream in pain from the shot. The pain surges through he little body and
>she
> > screams herself out cold. Her body seeping out what little mech fluid
>there
> > is left in her body.  Her body temperature starts to drop.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > -----------Original Message----------------
> > >From: KSLawdogg@...
> > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > >To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > >Subject: Re: New Beast Wars
> > >Date: Sun, 18 Jun 2000 14:08:14 EDT
> > >The Oblitercons/Anubis/Hades/Bumblebee/Injector:
> > >
> > >
> > >Dark One, Breakdown, Pyro, and Hiss watched the battle.
> > >
> > >"They're attacking Scavenger.  Those blasted Maximals, don't they know
> > >we're
> > >on their side!" Dark One yelled.  "Transform!" he commanded.
> > >
> > >
> > >Breakdown transformed into his artillery cannon mode, Pyro to his tank
> > >mode,
> > >and Hiss to his gun mode, Dark One catching him and taking aim with it.
> > >"Fire!" he yelled, pulling the trigger of Hiss's mode, firing three
> > >powerful
> > >plasma blasts off at Iron Raptor since she was so big and it was so 
>hard
>to
> > >hit people with a pistol without a scope at his distance.
> > >
> > >---
> > >
> > >Breakdown's internal computers found the target.  Assuring him of the
> > >target,
> > >he fired an explosive shell 3 ft high and 2 ft wide off at Dinobot, 
>even
> > >though Zardus was near him.
> > >
> > >---
> > >
> > >Pyro swtiched his weapon.  Firing two missiles from the missile 
>launchers
> > >in
> > >his tank form.  He still had the damage he had sustained in this mode,
>and
> > >it
> > >hurt like the Pit!  One missile flew off at Dinobot, the other at Iron
> > >Raptor
> > >in her gargantuan form, Pyro not sure who to shoot.  So many targets, 
>he
> > >might as well take the big one.
> > >
> > >---
> > >
> > >Anubis and Hades leapt into the air.  Anubis transformed into a left 
>arm,
> > >going into the air, while Hades turned into a leg, a left leg, heading
>into
> > >the air.
> > >
> > >
> > >====
> > >
> > >
> > >Bumblebee yelled, the shots slamming him through a branch, though he 
>was
> > >able
> > >to keep himself in the air.  Firing four missiles off at Ursa Major 
>(two
> > >from
> > >each launcher), he fired two optic blasts off at Dark Mouse, deciding 
>he
> > >shouldn't do that anymore, since he needed all the firepower he could
> > >muster
> > >with those Maxis around.
> > >
> > >---
> > >
> > >Injector, got back up, firing a single stinger missile off at Ramulus.
